A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think it was very good. Not the best movie I've seen but definitely the best Star Wars movie of them all. It's well written\, the characters all well developed and the story pays off. It's normal that it angries a lot of fans\, specially the nostalgic ones\, but all and all\, and leaving personal wants aside\, it is a solid movie that a lot of people will enjoy in the future.
